date: Sat Apr 02 2022 10:28:03 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
pageTitle: Harry Styles new single, 'As It Was'
keywords: Harry Styles,as it was lyrics harry styles,harry styles lyrics,as it was harry styles,harry styles new song,harry styles as it was,as it was harry,Olivia Wilde
description: Harry Styles' new single, 'As It Was' is the first single from his third solo album, Harry's House. The song is reminiscent of the twinkly, danceable indie pop from the blogrock era. Styles is a masterful songwriter, but he's traditionally shied away from going full pop. Fans online began debating which indie pop bands the song sounded most like.
metaDescription: Harry Styles' first new single from his third solo album, Harry's House, 'As It Was' is reminiscent of the twinkly indie pop from the blogrock era.
